author: https://caneandable.social/users/RareBird15
title: Hi everyone! How are you all doing tonight? I just had a frustrating experience trying to set up a free #domain or #subdomain for my #SelfHosted services. Unfortunately, I can't use my
text:
Hi everyone! How are you all doing tonight? I just had a frustrating experience trying to set up a free #domain or #subdomain for my #SelfHosted services. Unfortunately, I can‚Äôt use my laniecarmelo.tech domain because its current configuration doesn‚Äôt allow me to add subdomains.
I discovered EU.org, which offers free domains, and decided to give it a try. However, they require you to have authoritative #DNS #nameservers before requesting a domain. I tried using #Cloudflare, but it wasn‚Äôt authoritative. Then I looked into Hostry.com, Hurricane Electric DNS, and FreeDNS.
Hostry requires you to add DNS records for your domain before using their service‚Äîbut how can I do that when my domain doesn‚Äôt exist yet? ü§¶‚ôÄÔ∏è As for FreeDNS and Hurricane Electric, both have inaccessible #CAPTCHAs on their registration forms with no audio alternatives! üò°
At this point, I‚Äôm so frustrated that I‚Äôve decided to take a break from figuring this out. If anyone has tips for setting up a free domain or knows of accessible DNS services, I‚Äôd really appreciate your advice! üôè
#Accessibility #TechFrustration #WebHosting #BlindTech #blind #DisabilityInTech #tech #Technology #SelfHosting
@selfhost @selfhosting @selfhosted @mastoblind @main
log in or registerto comment.
@RareBird15@selfhost@selfhosting@selfhosted@mastoblind@mainAlso, having to add NS entries before registering the domain is the usual way. Most registrars even check that on registration, I‚Äôd say
@RareBird15@selfhost@selfhosting@selfhosted@mastoblind@main
I‚Äôm assuming by ‚Äúcurrent configuration‚Äù you have a DNS host that doesn‚Äôt allow adding NS records? One thing you might be able to do is create records like:host1.subdomain.laniecarmelo.tech A 1.2.3.4
host2.subdomain.laniecarmelo.tech A 1.2.3.5In my DNS host I can create a host1.subdomain A record without creating an actual subdomain (e.g. creating a subdomain.laniecarmelo.tech NS record).
@virtuous_sloth@selfhost@selfhosting@selfhosted@mastoblind@mainNo, my situation is weird. My domain is hosted onPorkbun.combut its nameservers point toVultr.com, where my WordPress install is hosted on a friend‚Äôs server. Porkbun won‚Äôt let me edit DNS records or do much of anything with my domain unless I change back to the default nameservers, which would break my WordPress setup.@RareBird15@selfhost@selfhosting@selfhosted@mastoblind@main
ah, gotcha. I do hope that you find a solution.
This seems overly complicated. Why not just get a domain on cloud flare for $10? Are free domains even a thing outside github pages
iirc, cloudflare domains are literally at cost.
I‚Äôve only hosted public sites for a year or so but cloudflare, cloudflare proxy, pointing at my servers is very easy :)
.coms are the cheapest at 10.44 I think

author: world today news
title: Ukraine announced the creation of a military command post in the Kursk region ‚Äì 2024-08-15 13:25:08
text:
Ukraine‚Äôs Supreme Commander-in-Chief Oleksandr Syrsky said on Thursday that Kiev had set up a military command post in the occupied part of Russia‚Äôs Kursk region, where he said his forces were still advancing and had taken up to 1.5 km in the past 24 hours, Reuters quoted him as saying.
Colonel-General Oleksandr Sirsky reported to President Volodymyr Zelensky in a video released by the Ukrainian leader that Kiev forces had advanced 35km into the Kursk region after invading the Russian region last week. Kiev‚Äôs assault on Russian territory last week surprised Moscow, taking the initiative away from Russian forces who have been making small but steady gains in eastern Ukraine all year.
Sirsky said Ukrainian forces took control of 82 settlements during the incursion and an area of ‚Äã‚Äã1,150 square kilometers.
He announced that he was appointing Major General Eduard Moskalev as the head of the military commandant in the Kiev-controlled part of western Russia.
‚ÄúWe are moving forward in the Kursk region. A military commandant‚Äôs office has been established, which must ensure order and also all the needs of the local population,‚Äù Sirski said in a written statement on his Telegram channel.
Ukraine‚Äôs Deputy Prime Minister Iryna Verechuk said on Wednesday that the Defense Forces plan to form a ‚Äúsecurity zone‚Äù in the Kursk region, where the offensive of the Ukrainian armed forces is taking place. According to Verechuk, quoted by Ukrainian media, the ‚Äúsecurity zone‚Äù includes conducting humanitarian operations to support the civilian population in the zone, opening humanitarian corridors for the evacuation of civilians to both Russia and Ukraine, and admitting international humanitarian organizations in this area.
Ukrainian special forces said they captured a group of more than 100 Russian soldiers on Wednesday, including from the elite Chechen Akhmat formation, who were part of the 488th Guards Motorized Rifle Regiment.
Ukraine‚Äôs human rights commissioner Dmytro Lubinets said this week that he had held talks with his Russian counterpart about exchanging prisoners of war taken in the Kursk region. news.bg
#Ukraine #announced #creation #military #command #post #Kursk #region

author: Newsroom Infobae
title: El exfutbolista peruano Hugo Sotil es internado en cuidados intensivos en un hospital de Lima - Infobae
text:
Lima, 19 dic (EFE).- El exfutbolista peruano Hugo 'Cholo', jugador del FC Barcelona en los a√±os setenta -en una √©poca en la que coincidi√≥ con el astro holand√©s Johan Cruyff-, ha sido internado en la unidad de cuidados intensivos (UCI) de un hospital de Lima tras sufrir un problema de salud durante la madrugada de este jueves, informaron fuentes oficiales.
Sotil, de 75 a√±os, fue ingresado en el servicio de emergencia del Hospital Dos de Mayo, donde recibi√≥ "atenci√≥n especializada inmediata" y actualmente est√° "monitoreado constantemente" en cuidados intensivos, se√±al√≥ el Ministerio de Salud (Minsa) en un comunicado.
El Minsa a√±adi√≥ que "por pedido expreso de la familia" del exinternacional peruano "no se brindar√° mayores detalles sobre su estado de salud", por lo que pidi√≥ a los medios de comunicaci√≥n y a la ciudadan√≠a "respetar esta decisi√≥n, as√≠ como la privacidad del paciente y su entorno cercano".
"El Hospital Dos de Mayo garantiza la atenci√≥n m√©dica especializada que requiere el Sr. Hugo Sotil", concluy√≥.
El exdelantero, quien anot√≥ el gol del 1-0 que le dio a Per√∫ el t√≠tulo de la Copa Am√©rica de 1975 frente a Colombia, particip√≥ el pasado 29 de noviembre en la gala celebrada en el Gran Teatro del Liceo de Barcelona por el 125 aniversario de la entidad azulgrana.
Sotil conform√≥ junto con el holand√©s Johan Cruyff una de las delanteras m√°s recordadas del Barcelona, que en la temporada 1973-1974 logr√≥ una goleada por 0-5 frente al Real Madrid en el estadio Bernabeu.
Durante su reciente visita a Barcelona, el exjugador se declar√≥ feliz de haber regresado "a casa" y dijo que el nuevo estadio del club catal√°n "es hermoso".

author: EFE Agencias
title: ¬øSextorsi√≥n?: Mark Zuckerberg anunci√≥ una nueva funci√≥n para proteger las fotos √≠ntimas
text: [Tecnolog√≠a](https://www.debate.com.mx/seccion/tecnologia/) ¬øSextorsi√≥n?: Mark Zuckerberg anunci√≥ una nueva funci√≥n para proteger las fotos √≠ntimas El fundador de Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, emiti√≥ un comunicado donde anunci√≥ que est√° trabajando para detectar las posibles estafas de "sextorsi√≥n", donde los delincuentes extorsionan a las personas con sus fotos √≠ntimas [Un hombre qued√≥ paralizado tras un paseo en una playa de M√©xico: Una ola le rompi√≥ el cuello](https://www.debate.com.mx/mundo/Un-hombre-quedo-paralizado-tras-un-paseo-en-una-playa-de-Mexico-Una-ola-le-rompio-el-cuello-20240411-0080.html) [Video: Mujer intenta envenenar a su esposo poniendo cloro en su caf√©: Quer√≠a cobrar el seguro](https://www.debate.com.mx/viral/Video-Mujer-intenta-envenenar-a-su-esposo-poniendo-cloro-en-su-cafe-Queria-cobrar-el-seguro-20240411-0100.html) [Video: Perro que hab√≠a sido reportado como perdido, fue descubierto con una familia de osos](https://www.debate.com.mx/viral/Video-Perro-que-habia-sido-reportado-como-perdido-fue-descubierto-con-una-familia-de-osos-20240411-0125.html) [Indignante: Mujer golpea con un palo a una perrita que acababa de dar a luz](https://www.debate.com.mx/mundo/Indignante-Mujer-golpea-con-un-palo-a-una-perrita-que-acababa-de-dar-a-luz-20240411-0146.html) Nueva York.- El gigante [tecnol√≥gico](https://www.debate.com.mx/seccion/tecnologia/) Meta, fundado por Mark Zuckerberg, anunci√≥ este jueves que est√° probando nuevas funciones en su red social para proteger a los j√≥venes de la 'sextorsi√≥n' y el abuso de im√°genes √≠ntimas, y para hacer m√°s dif√≠cil que los delincuentes potenciales encuentren e interact√∫en con los adolescentes. En un comunicado publicado en su p√°gina web, la empresa matriz de Facebook, WhatsApp o Instagram indic√≥ que tambi√©n est√° probando nuevas formas de ayudar a las personas a detectar posibles estafas de 'sextorsi√≥n', animarlas a denunciarlas y empoderarlas para decir no a cualquier cosa que les haga sentir inc√≥modas en las redes sociales. La 'sextorsion' o extorsi√≥n sexual implica chantajear a una v√≠ctima de la que se tienen im√°genes √≠ntimas y es un fen√≥meno cada vez m√°s extendido en las redes sociales y afecta especialmente a los j√≥venes. Seg√∫n Meta, la 'sextorsi√≥n' "es un crimen horrible. Hemos pasado a√±os trabajando estrechamente con expertos, incluidos aquellos con experiencia en la lucha contra estos delitos, para comprender las t√°cticas que utilizan los estafadores para encontrar y extorsionar a las v√≠ctimas en l√≠nea, de modo que podamos desarrollar formas efectivas de ayudar a detenerlos". Por ello, est√°n probando "nuevas herramientas" para "hacer que sea lo m√°s dif√≠cil posible para los estafadores encontrar objetivos potenciales, en las aplicaciones de Meta y en Internet. Tambi√©n estamos probando nuevas medidas para ayudar a los j√≥venes a reconocer y protegerse de las estafas de 'sextorsi√≥n'", precis√≥ la compa√±√≠a. Entre las nuevas herramientas, el gigante de las redes sociales confirm√≥ que comenzar√° a probar un filtro de desnudez en los mensajes directos en Instagram. Esta funci√≥n, llamada protecci√≥n contra la desnudez, estar√° activada de forma predeterminada para los menores de 18 a√±os y desenfocar√° autom√°ticamente las im√°genes enviadas a los usuarios que se detecten que contienen desnudez, protegiendo mejor a los usuarios de ver desnudos no deseados en sus mensajes directos. Entre las medidas tambi√©n se incluye configurar de forma predeterminada los perfiles de adolescentes para que no puedan recibir mensajes de nadie con quien no est√©n conectados. Y mostrar√°n avisos de seguridad a los adolescentes que ya est√°n en contacto con posibles cuentas fraudulentas ofreciendo la opci√≥n de realizar denuncias. El gigante de las redes sociales se√±al√≥ que "las empresas tienen la responsabilidad de garantizar la protecci√≥n de los menores que utilizan sus plataformas" califica de "alentadoras" estas medidas tomadas para el uso de sus redes. - ¬øNo te has dado una vuelta por Amazon? Mira en [ESTE ENLACE](https://amzn.to/442uyXx)sus mejores productos [¬°√önete a la comunidad del canal de Debate en WhatsApp y recibe lo m√°s relevante!](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va2VOoSEgGfKeOYnUB36) [S√≠guenos en](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMI66_wowu_H4Ag?utm_source=nota_standard&utm_medium=fullamp&utm_campaign=banner_googlenews) Comparte esta noticia Los editores recomiendan - {{#section-name}} [{{section-name}}]({{section-url}}){{/section-name}} [{{title-article}}]({{link-url}}) {{/news}}

title: Homem marca encontro em app de relacionamento e tem casa invadida por criminosos | Cear√° | G1
text:
Um homem marcou um encontro atrav√©s de um aplicativo de relacionamento e teve a casa roubada nesta ter√ßa-feira (8) na cidade de Sobral, interior do Cear√°. A Delegacia Municipal de Sobral investiga o caso.
A dupla anunciou o assalto, revirou a casa do rapaz e levou televis√£o, notebook, celular, dinheiro e mais objetos pessoais.
Homem marca encontro em app de relacionamento e tem casa assaltada
Um h omem marcou um encontro atrav√©s de um aplicativo de relacionamento e teve a casa roubada nesta ter√ßa-feira (8) na cidade de Sobral , interior do Cear√°. A Delegacia Municipal de Sobral investiga o caso.
De acordo com informa√ß√µes policiais, a v√≠tima come√ßou a conversar com um perfil do aplicativo sem saber que eram dois criminosos disfar√ßados.
LEIA TAMB√âM:
1 de 3 A dupla anuniciou o assalto, revirou a casa do rapaz e levou televis√£o, notebook, celular, dinheiro e mais objetos pessoais. ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o A dupla anuniciou o assalto, revirou a casa do rapaz e levou televis√£o, notebook, celular, dinheiro e mais objetos pessoais. ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o
Ele marcou o encontro em sua casa, localizada no Bairro Belchior, e ao receber a visita se deparou com dois homens armados. A dupla anunciou o assalto, revirou a casa do rapaz e levou televis√£o, notebook, celular, dinheiro e outros objetos pessoais.
Ap√≥s o roubo, os suspeitos pediram um carro de aplicativo para fugir. O motorista, no entanto, n√£o tem envolvimento com o crime.
A dupla foi perseguida por equipes policiais, mas somente um deles - um adolescente - foi apreendido . O outro suspeito continua sendo procurado. O adolescente vai responder por ato infracional an√°logo a roubo e tem antecedentes por les√£o corporal e recepta√ß√£o.
2 de 3 Encontro amoroso termina em assalto no CE. ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/TV Verdes Mares Encontro amoroso termina em assalto no CE. ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/TV Verdes Mares

author: TOI Science Desk
title: Severe solar storm to hit Earth; could disrupt communications, produce northern lights in US - Times of India
text: NEW DELHI: A potent solar storm is on its way towards Earth, which would potentially bring forth northern lights across the United States while also posing a threat to communication systems. The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) has issued a rare geomagnetic storm watch, marking the first such warning in almost two decades. This watch will be in effect starting Friday and extending throughout the weekend.According to NOAA, the sun has been emitting intense solar flares since Wednesday, resulting in five significant outbursts of plasma. These eruptions, known as coronal mass ejections, have the capacity to disrupt satellites orbiting Earth and interfere with power grids. Each of these eruptions may contain billions of tons of solar plasma.NOAA emphasizes the unusual nature of this event, noting that the flares appear to be linked to a sunspot that is 16 times the diameter of Earth. The agency recalls the impact of an extreme geomagnetic storm in 2003, which caused power outages in Sweden and inflicted damage on power transformers in South Africa.Forecasters anticipate that the impending storm could lead to the appearance of northern lights as far south as Alabama and Northern California in the US, as per NOAA.(With agency inputs)

author: David Iversen, Reporter
title: Two adults were found dead in a Desert Cedars home. Police are investigating
text:
Two adults were found dead inside a home this morning after Maricopa police responded to a welfare check on Cypress Lane in Desert Cedars.
Officers arrived at the residence at approximately 11 a.m. this morning and discovered the bodies inside, according to a statement from the Maricopa Police Department spokesperson, Monica Williams.
Detectives have launched a death investigation. Authorities said the cause and manner of death are currently under review in coordination with the Pinal County Medical Examiner‚Äôs Office.
Police said there is no indication of an ongoing threat to the community but offered no further information about the deceased or the circumstances surrounding their deaths.
The identity of the homeowner is known to InMaricopa , but we‚Äôre withholding the information as the investigation is ongoing.

author: Bitcoinist
title: Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX) among the top gainers this year, InQubeta emerges as the best ICO of 2023 | Bitcoinist.com
text: In the constantly changing world of cryptocurrencies, 2023 has turned out to be a year filled with amazing gains and big breakthroughs. Standing out in the crowd, two top altcoins, Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX), have made a name for themselves as the big winners. They‚Äôve managed to sail through all sorts of regulatory hurdles and market ups and downs with incredible toughness. Yet, even amidst these giants, InQubeta, a new ICO, has carved out its own niche, earning the title of the best ICO of the year. It‚Äôs a narrative that intertwines the relentless pursuit of innovation with the undying spirit of the crypto community. InQubeta: A Story of Vision and Triumph [InQubeta‚Äôs](https://qube.la/bit327) journey to becoming the best ICO of 2023 reads like a tale of ambition meeting opportunity. Picture a world where AI‚Äôs endless potential is no longer confined to tech behemoths but shared with a community of enthusiastic investors, each contributing to and benefiting from this technological revolution. This is the world InQubeta envisioned and is successfully bringing to life. InQubeta has really changed the game by making it possible for pretty much anyone to invest in AI startups with their QUBE tokens. It‚Äôs like opening the door to a world that used to be hard to get into. Now, imagine being part of groundbreaking AI innovations that could change entire industries, transform how consumers experience things or even tackle some of the biggest problems facing humanity. That‚Äôs the kind of opportunity InQubeta is offering its investors. The platform‚Äôs success in its ICO, having raised over $7.6 million, is more than just hitting a financial goal. It‚Äôs proof of the belief and excitement of a whole community that‚Äôs come together to support this vision. Each QUBE token holder is not just an investor but a pioneer in a movement that blends finance with futuristic technology, charting a course towards a more equitable and innovative future. Solana‚Äôs Resilient Ascent Solana‚Äôs journey in 2023, marked by its ascent over Ripple (XRP) in market capitalization, is a story of resilience and innovation. Despite facing SEC‚Äôs scrutiny, SOL‚Äôs value and community support remained unshaken, a testament to the robustness of its technology and the loyalty of its user base. The success of this top crypto coin is a narrative of defying odds, harnessing the power of decentralized finance, and creating an ecosystem that resonates with developers and investors alike. Avalanche‚Äôs Phoenix-Like Rise Avalanche‚Äôs rebound post the FTX crisis is nothing short of a phoenix rising from the ashes. It‚Äôs a story of a blockchain platform reaffirming its strength and utility in the DeFi space, attracting renewed interest and investment. AVAX‚Äôs recovery and growth reflect the resilience of the crypto market and the unwavering belief in decentralized solutions‚Äô potential to transform finance. Closing Thoughts 2023 has been a standout year, especially with Solana and Avalanche showing how flexible and resilient cryptocurrencies can be, even when things get tough. But the real star of the show has been InQubeta. Their cryptocurrency ICO wasn‚Äôt just a financial win; it really caught the attention and imagination of people all around the world. InQubeta‚Äôs story goes way beyond just the numbers. It‚Äôs about paving the way for the future of AI and making this game-changing tech accessible to everyone. Disclaimer: This is a paid release. The statements, views and opinions expressed in this column are solely those of the content provider and do not necessarily represent those of Bitcoinist. Bitcoinist does not guarantee the accuracy or timeliness of information available in such content. Do your research and invest at your own risk.

author: Pablo Javier Piacente
title: La IA ya est√° ocupando puestos de trabajo
text:
Tecnolog√≠a y sociedad
La IA ya est√° ocupando puestos de trabajo: chatbots y profesionales freelance
Los chatbots han reducido en un 21% la demanda de profesionales freelance, sobretodo en tareas m√°s rutinarias que creativas
Pablo Javier Piacente
Desde el auge de la Inteligencia Artificial (IA), y m√°s a√∫n luego de la popularizaci√≥n de ChatGPT y otras aplicaciones de chatbot, la demanda de algunas especialidades laborales relacionadas con la creaci√≥n de contenidos, la programaci√≥n o la entrada de datos ha sufrido un importante descenso, seg√∫n un nuevo estudio. Los resultados confirman que se requerir√° una combinaci√≥n de nuevas estrategias profesionales por parte de los trabajadores y de iniciativas de seguridad social encaradas por estados y organizaciones civiles para reducir el impacto de los cambios.
Un equipo de cient√≠ficos de la Universidad de Harvard, en Estados Unidos, el Instituto Alem√°n de Investigaci√≥n Econ√≥mica y el Imperial College de Londres, en el Reino Unido, estudiaron casi un mill√≥n y medio de puestos de trabajo solicitados en un importante portal de profesionales independientes a nivel global, desde julio de 2021 hasta julio de 2023, y revelaron que la demanda de las posiciones freelance propensas a la automatizaci√≥n cay√≥ un 21%, solamente ocho meses despu√©s del lanzamiento de ChatGPT, a fines de 2022.
El documento, publicado en OpenRead y SSRN, analiza el impacto de las tecnolog√≠as de Inteligencia Artificial (IA) en la demanda de trabajadores independientes online utilizando un gran conjunto de datos de una plataforma l√≠der, cuyo nombre no fue revelado. Los cient√≠ficos identificaron los tipos de trabajos que se ven m√°s afectados por la IA generativa y cuantificaron la magnitud del impacto en ese mercado laboral espec√≠fico.
Un fuerte impacto
Los hallazgos muestran una disminuci√≥n del 21% en el n√∫mero de puestos de trabajo con posibilidad de ser automatizados mediante la IA, principalmente en las tareas de car√°cter m√°s rutinario ligadas a la creaci√≥n y redacci√≥n de contenidos, la codificaci√≥n y programaci√≥n, el dise√±o y el ingreso de datos, entre otras especialidades.
Analizando en concreto algunos detalles, observaron que la introducci√≥n de tecnolog√≠as de https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/09/16/ia-cambiar-opinion-creyentes-fervorosos-108219108.html para la generaci√≥n de im√°genes condujo a una disminuci√≥n significativa del 17% en el n√∫mero de puestos de trabajo relacionados con la producci√≥n visual para proyectos digitales. A trav√©s de la herramienta Google Trends, pudieron demostrar que la disminuci√≥n m√°s pronunciada en la demanda de profesionales freelance dentro de los secores indicados se relaciona directamente con el crecimiento de la popularidad y el concimiento de las potencialidades de ChatGPT y otros sistemas similares.
Desaf√≠os y nuevas oportunidades al mismo tiempo
Seg√∫n un art√≠culo publicado en Fast Company, los especialistas sostienen que los responsables de pol√≠ticas p√∫blicas y directores de organizaciones sociales deber√°n promover el acceso equitativo a oportunidades de educaci√≥n y capacitaci√≥n, apoyar a los trabajadores desplazados a trav√©s de redes de seguridad social y llevar adelante programas de reempleo, entre otras posibles medidas.
Por √∫ltimo, TechRadar informa que los investigadores subrayaron en el estudio que aunque el mercado laboral parece sombr√≠o para algunas especialidades, al mismo tiempo surgir√°n nuevas profesiones, como ya ha sucedido durante cambios tecnol√≥gicos previos. Al mismo tiempo, muchos profesionales lograr√°n adaptar sus habilidades al nuevo entorno y mantendr√°n sus empleos, saliendo incluso fortalecidos al volcarse a tareas m√°s creativas o anal√≠ticas, que la IA a√∫n no logra dominar.
Referencia
Who is AI Replacing? The Impact of ChatGPT on Online Freelancing Platforms. Ozge Demirci, Jonas Hannane and Xinrong Zhu. OpenRead / SSRN (2024). DOI:https://doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.4602944
Marta estalla contra Matamoros tras su viaje a Asturias: 'Que me ayude con la crianza, lo estoy haciendo yo solaControlado el pavoroso incendio en varias naves de Silvota: levantan el confinamiento a los vecinosYa hay fecha para reabrir (parcialmente) el Huerna... 'si el tiempo acompa√±a', aclara el ministro √ìscar PuentePedro Pascal y Joseph Quinn: la incre√≠ble visita sorpresa de dos de Los Cuatro Fant√°sticos a un colegio ovetenseFallece una mujer tras salirse de la v√≠a con su coche y caer a un prado junto a las v√≠as del tren, en AllerPreocupaci√≥n por el estado de salud de Makoke tras desaparecer en las redes sociales: 'He estado bastante malHacienda ya avisa a los mayores de 65 a√±os con un piso o una casa en propiedad sobre el IRPFOrtega Cano sorprende con su nueva imagen en su reaparici√≥n p√∫blica tras su aparatoso accidente: 'Que me quede como estoy
